__inputs.name: DS_PROMETHEUS
__inputs.label: Prometheus Data Source
__inputs.description: Select your Prometheus data source containing vSphere metrics.

targets.expr: sum by (vcenter_host_name, direction) (vcenter_host_network_throughput{job="integrations/vsphere", vcenter_datacenter_name=~"$datacenter", vcenter_cluster_name=~"$cluster", vcenter_host_name=~"$host", object=""}) * 1000

sum by (vcenter_host_name, direction) (vcenter_host_disk_latency_avg_milliseconds{job="integrations/vsphere", vcenter_datacenter_name=~"$datacenter", vcenter_cluster_name=~"$cluster", vcenter_host_name=~"$host"})

sum by(vcenter_vm_name, direction) (vcenter_vm_network_throughput_bytes_per_second{job="integrations/vsphere", vcenter_datacenter_name=~"$datacenter", vcenter_cluster_name=~"$cluster", vcenter_host_name=~"$host", vcenter_vm_name=~"$vm", object=""}) * 1000

sum by(vcenter_vm_name) (vcenter_vm_network_usage{job="integrations/vsphere", vcenter_datacenter_name=~"$datacenter", vcenter_cluster_name=~"$cluster", vcenter_host_name=~"$host", vcenter_vm_name=~"$vm", object=""}) * 1000

sum by (vcenter_vm_name, direction) (vcenter_vm_disk_latency_avg_milliseconds{job="integrations/vsphere", vcenter_datacenter_name=~"$datacenter", vcenter_cluster_name=~"$cluster", vcenter_host_name=~"$host", vcenter_vm_name=~"$vm"})

sum by(vcenter_vm_name, direction) (vcenter_vm_disk_throughput{job="integrations/vsphere", vcenter_datacenter_name=~"$datacenter", vcenter_cluster_name=~"$cluster", vcenter_host_name=~"$host", vcenter_vm_name=~"$vm", object=""})

sum by(vcenter_vm_name) (vcenter_vm_disk_usage_bytes{job="integrations/vsphere", vcenter_datacenter_name=~"$datacenter", vcenter_cluster_name=~"$cluster", vcenter_host_name=~"$host", vcenter_vm_name=~"$vm"})
